Texts.Chs: 把^orange;军备作坊^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Armorworks^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我有些蠢。我想拥有一个只属于我自己的军备作坊，但是我实在做不来。你能在加工台为我做一个吗？
Texts.Eng: I'll be blunt. I need my own ^orange;Armorworks^reset; but lack the skill to create one. Could you perhaps ^orange;make one for me on a Machining Table^reset;?.
Thanks a heap. Here, take this off my hands.
